Multivariable Calculus | The equation of a sphere.

\begin{array}{l}\n\quad(x, y, z) \\\n\left(x_{0}, y_{0}, z_{0}\right) \\\n\left(x-x_{0}\right)^{2}+\left(y-y_{0}\right)^{2}+\left(z-z_{0}\right)^{2}=r^{2}\n\end{array}[imath]\quad(x, y, z) [/imath] [imath]\left(x_{0}, y_{0}, z_{0}\right) [/imath] [imath]\left(x-x_{0}\right)^{2}+\left(y-y_{0}\right)^{2}+\left(z-z_{0}\right)^{2}=r^{2}[/imath]
